title: Textile, 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: stenciled resist (katazome) on plain weave
dimensions:
H x W: 176.5 x 33 cm (5 ft. 9 1/2 in. x 13 in.)
Repeat H: 19 cm (7 1/2 in.)
description: Length of stencil resist (katazome) showing ivory pattern on blue ground with dots. Flowers with similar centers and varying shaped radiating petals and curling stems.
